created_at.description: When the log entry was created.

duration_ms.description: Duration of the operation in milliseconds.

error_message.description: Error message if the operation failed.

external_resource_id.description: External resource identifier in the target system.

http_status.description: HTTP status code returned by the target.

id.description: Unique identifier for this log entry.

internal_resource_id.description: Internal resource identifier in the IDP.

retry_count.description: Number of retry attempts for this operation.

sync_run_id.description: Optional sync run that triggered this operation.

target_id.description: The SCIM target (application) this operation was directed at.

tenant_id.description: The tenant this log belongs to.

404.description: Target or log entry not found
